rules_text:
Flash
When Soul's Mediator enters, you may [b][counter target spell.] [/b]Put X +1/+1 counters on Soul's Mediator, where X is half that spell's mana value rounded up.
Flash paradigm {1}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
